content.rendered:
The Saratoga Springs City School District is once again offering free summer meals for all students! From July 7 through August 22, students can enjoy nutritious and delicious meals at no cost—no registration required.

This summer, meals will be conveniently served by our Food Truck, which will make three regular stops each weekday:

  • West Side Rec Park from 10:30 a.m. – 11:15 a.m.
  • Saratoga Springs Rec Center from 11:30 a.m. – 12:30 p.m.
  • Saratoga Children’s Museum from 12:45 p.m. – 1:30 p.m.

The summer meals program is free for all youth and teens!
